titleStmt.title: A dialogue between a pædo-baptist and an anti-pædo-baptist containing the strength of arguments offered on both sides at the Portsmouth disputation, with the addition of a few more arguments then ready to be offered in vindication of infant baptism / by Samuel Chandler and William Leigh.
titleStmt.author: Chandler, Samuel.
Leigh, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Chandler ... and sold by A. Baldwin,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
